author: nickcrow_
content:
Hey everyone, I lead the in-house research team at Mycelium. We have recently gone through a bit of an upskilling phase which has left us with a series of educational deep dives. We only have a few up on our site atm but we will be pushing them out weekly. 

The complete collection covers a pretty varied range of topics, but we will be focusing more on zk and cryptography work in the near future. I hope these docs are beneficial to you.

(edit: Also if anyone is interested in providing feedback on some of our unreleased docs please reach out)
https://mycelium.xyz/research
